com.gemalto.idp.mobile.oob.message

Interface OobTransactionSigningRequest

  • All Superinterfaces:
    OobIncomingMessage, OobMessage, OobMessageMeta

    public interface OobTransactionSigningRequest
extends OobIncomingMessage, OobMessageMeta
    Interface of a transaction verify request from the OOB server.
    Since:
    4.4

      • createResponse

        OobTransactionSigningResponse createResponse(OobTransactionSigningResponse.OobTransactionSigningResponseValue response,
                                             SecureString otp,
                                             Map<String,String> meta)
                                      throws OobException
        Create an outgoing response for the current message.
        Parameters:
        response - The response to provide to the transaction.
        otp - The OTP to send over to OOB server. Can be null only if user denied the transaction.
        meta - The metadata for the message. Can be null.
        Returns:
        The outgoing message ready to be send.
        Throws:
        OobException
        Since:
        4.4
